origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'SupplierAPI.get_partners', 'description': 'This function retrieves the list of suppliers and partners for a specified company, focusing on specific technologies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company.'}, {'name': 'technology', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The technologies to focus on, e.g., IoT, SmartWarehousing.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'partners', 'description': 'The list of suppliers and partners.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 SupplierAPI.get_partners, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'Hitachi', 'technology'是'IoT,SmartWarehousing'.
